prompt:
Given a question and four options, please select the right answer. Your answer should be "A", "B", "C" or "D". Please directly give the answer without any explanation.
The question is:Which of the following statements about the self-interaction cross-section of dark matter is consistent with recent observations on a dwarf galaxy scale?
A. The self-interaction cross-section of dark matter is greater than 1 cm²/g.
B. The self-interaction cross-section of dark matter is exactly 0.1 cm²/g.
C. The self-interaction cross-section of dark matter is less than 0.01 cm²/g.
D. There is no expected self-interaction of dark matter in dwarf galaxies.
expected_answer: A. The self-interaction cross-section of dark matter is greater than 1 cm²/g.
